name: Pinto (ASAP) - Autocaravanas area
title: (28320) Pinto (ASAP) - Autocaravanas area
description: Public service area for PINTO motorhomes, it is 19km south of Madrid, it has 45 places: You can empty and fill the tanks 4 vehicles at the same time, there are 2 wells to empty the black water ( Potty) very well done. TRAIN station at 1.5km and BUS (421) at 200m, both take you to Madrid in 30' and 45'. Large park with many spaces and a beautiful lake, a commercial area right next to it with the cheapest laundromat and petrol station in Spain.

title: (28320) Pinto - s/n Calle Pablo Picasso

title: (28350) Ciempozuelos - 8R Calle del Consuelo

title: (28500) Madrid - 4X Diseminado Cr M 3020
description:
A well equipped and little crowded lagoon. Daytime only. Large AC fits well in the parking lot. Good place to spend the day or to rest. You pay €1 to enter and enjoy the picnic tables, the play area and bathroom. There is a restaurant/cafeteria (in it the toilets). Great place for a break near Madrid. Outside the enclosure there is a place to park and possibly spend the night (we did not stay).
Be careful when entering because you pass the Laguna sign (it is half covered with vegetation) and then when you go down the hill it seems that it is closed but there is a small door to the left of the gate.
In the parking lot there are more than 40 spaces and around 30 tables inside (not all of them have shade)

the water fountain works in summer

A restaurant next door and a cafeteria/teteria.
Buses next door and metro 5 min with large parking.
Large motorhomes enter, it is usually free, if it is full in the vicinity there is always room.

title: (28500) - 16D Diseminado Cm de Alcala

Very quiet both day and night. Children's playgrounds and a large park with green areas nearby. Tram 2 min away with a connection in 10 min to the Madrid renfe commuter train without transfer. Quiet and safe area (AC parked all year), away from noise. Possible access to gym and supermarket toilet. Suitable for all types of vehicle sizes.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 2T Calle Pamplona

title: (28380) Colmenar de Oreja - 38B Calle de San Sebastián
title_short: (28380) Colmenar de Oreja - 38B Calle de San Sebastián
description: NEW MOTORHOMES PARKING AREA IN COLMENAR DE OREJA (MADRID) The Colmenar de Oreja City Council enables a new parking space for motorhomes, caravans and campers next to the Jardines de los Huertos and the Hermitage of San Isidro, near the town historical, which will facilitate sightseeing for itinerant travelers. The parking area has: - Shaded wooded area - Children's play area - Picnic area - Drinking water - Capacity 8 vehicles - Free area - Allows overnight (maximum 48h) - Nearby gas station - Supermarkets in the vicinity - Restaurants in the proximity - Wine cellars in the proximity - Next to the historic center of Colmenar de Oreja, declared a Site of Cultural Interest. - Cycling routes (Ciclamadrid Aranjuez-Chinchón and Ciclamadrid Belmonte-Villarejo de Salvanés) - Hiking routes (Vereda del Cristo, Train Route, Fountains Route, Tagus Route) * Does not have: drainage of gray / black water, connection electrical

title: (28032) Madrid - Blvr. de Jose Prat
description: We discovered this place through a blog. It is free and you can stay overnight. Apparently there are always motorhomes parked here. We spent one night and everything was fine. Safe. It has a shopping center in front and the neighborhood is quiet with large parks.

description: Parking next to Renfe train station, quiet night, you hear trains.

title: (28041) Madrid - 90 Camino de Perales

title: (28840) Mejorada del Campo - 3 Calle Argentina
description: Ideal parking to visit the Cathedral of Justo in Mejorada Del Campo. Famous for his Aquarius ad. Spectacular to see the building. The car park is large and great for RVs and Vans. The Police are right in front, so in theory it is a quiet and safe place. You can walk to the Cathedral and there is also a bike lane. Supermarkets, Gas Station, Burger next door. There is a charger for Electric Cars. Very good communication with Carreteras de Madrid such as the M50 or R3 and it is also next to Alcalá De Henares, which is also worth a visit!

title: (28914) Leganés - 2B Calle Parla
description: Ample parking with level spaces next to the commuter train that leaves you in Atocha in 20 minutes. Good for visiting Madrid, although we have not stayed overnight, it seems like a quiet and safe place. Public toilets at the train station when it is open. There is a large park next door with picnic areas, ping pong tables and swings for children

title: (28041) Madrid - 33 Calle de Beasain
description: Fuente de pulsador

title: (28041) Madrid - 34 Calle de González Feito
description: Good place to stay 4 the night. Just the closest spot to M30 inner circle and proper place if going to a festival in the Enrique Tierno Galván Park (i.e. tomavistas). just an urban place to park during the day and stay at night, for free in Madrid (which is not easy).

title: (28041) Madrid - 275 Calle Segura
description: Parking in a very quiet area without traffic, a few meters away there is a push-button fountain where water can be loaded. It has a very large park and some shadows.

title: (28914) Leganés - 1A Calle de Francisco Largo Caballero
title_short: (28914) Leganés - 1A Calle de Francisco Largo Caballero

title: (28550) Tielmes - 1 Calle Carretera de Villarejo
description: Parking of the sports center and the pool. Swing area, futsal and basketball. We have stayed overnight and nobody told us anything. Good area for cycling and hiking in Via Verde.

title: (28026) Madrid - 83 Avenida de Rafaela Ybarra
description: It is a parking lot between the pradolongo park and a sports center (with a paid swimming pool in summer and more services), a minute's walk from an entrance to the park there is a public bath, next to a residence. Also, not far away there is a gas station also with restrooms and a store, I don't know if they have more services but it's a question of asking? Nearby you have public transport to get to the city center if you are visiting (bus 60, 6, 78, 81 and metro Plaza Elíptica lines 6 and 11)

title: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
title_short: (28038) Madrid - 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala
description:
In this street there are usually large parking spaces next to Parque de las Tetas (Cerro del Tio Pio), from where you have magnificent views of Madrid and the sunset. It has no shade and is not flat.
There is a free public toilet next door.
There are also several fountains, one of them in the children's area next to the viewpoint bar, although there are several more throughout the park. Next to it there are also some calisthenics bars to exercise.
It is in the Vallecas neighborhood, so relatively close you can find all kinds of establishments. It is about a 15-minute walk from the Nueva Numancia metro, which in 10 more minutes leaves you in the center of Madrid.

address.street: 10 Calle de Ramón Pérez de Ayala

title: (28918) Leganés - 1 Calle Puerto de Piedrafita
description: Large tarmac car park just in front of a police building. In order to visit Madrid, we had bad surprises that completely ruined us one day and this place helped us out with a better feeling felt in terms of security. suitable for any size. Right next to a Park

title: (28550) Tielmes - Calle del Cercado
description: Perfect place to rest, you can do simple hiking and cycling routes

title: (28053) Madrid - 3 Calle del Monte Perdido

If you have a gym basic fit there is one and you can shower

title: (28054) Madrid - Av. de los Poblados, 118

The place is very bad, if you have no choice in any part of the town as there is a wide street, I would spend the night, now traveling here thinking that it is a good place, I do not recommend it.

title: (28030) Madrid - 66 Calle Jose Bergamín
description: It is a park that you can see that the works have been finished very recently and they are just putting up trees, we have spent 2 very quiet nights. some motorhomes staying overnight but the stalls are small so the motorhomes I have seen parked were occupying 3 stalls. It is a dirt car park with very little unevenness. good for fall - winter - spring, no big trees yet and no cover from the sun. being from land there is a lot of dust and having the windows open is a disaster

description: Recreation area, grove, lake, picnic area.

description: Very quiet neighborhood and 200 meters from the metro station, the road can be heard a little, but it's fine, I would go back.

title: (28022) Madrid - 47 Paseo de Ginebra

title_short: (28830) San Fernando de Henares - 2 Avenida de San Sebastian

title_short: (28917) La Fortuna - 23 Calle de San Pedro

title: (28019) Madrid - 54 Calle Comandante Fontanes

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 1E Arroyo Caño
description:
Aparcamiento gratuito en vía pública. Los aparcamientos no son muy amplios, por lo que es más para furgonetas pequeñas/medianas que para autocaravanas o Camper de grandes dimensiones.
Al lado está el centro de Salud, hay un restaurante y un supermercado.
Tranquilo para pasar la noche. Aunque por la mañana hay trasiego de coches.

title: (28925) Alcorcón - 5 Calle las Adelfas
description: Laundry, opposite has a supermarket

title: (28047) Madrid -
description: Free parking. Outside the regulated parking area. Next to the Green Wedge Park. Bus to the center 24h. 10 'walking from Madrid Río, 45' walking from Plaza Mayor and Casa de Campo (walking all through the park). Bike path to Madrid Río and Casa de Campo. Ideal to visit Madrid.

title: (28044) Madrid - 62 Avenida de los Poblados

title: (28037) Madrid - 8B Calle Juan de Arespacochaga y Felipe
title_short: (28037) Madrid - 8B Calle Juan de Arespacochaga y Felipe

title: (28047) Madrid - 2 Calle de Pablo Sarasate

title_short: (28047) Madrid - Av. de Angel Sanz Briz
